contextId.information: Here "knee" refers to the whole person, and bending the knee to kneel on the ground is a metonym for worship. AT: "every person will worship God" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
Here "tongue" refers to the whole person. AT: "every person" or "every being" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
Paul refers to the believers by using the word "spirit," which is what enables humans to relate to God. AT: "with you" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
